ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
10 drops hot sauce (such as Frank's RedHot Â®)
des: "A new twist on regular egg salad! This is so good and I am always asked for the recipe. Hope you enjoy it as much as we do! Serve on lettuce leaves or your favorite cracker."
ins: Combine eggs, avocados, tomatoes, red onion, salt, and pepper together in a bowl. Stir mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, and hot sauce into egg mixture until evenly coated.
